description:
Google Gemini app is your personal, proactive and powerful AI assistant.

With Gemini on your iPhone or iPad, you can:

– Go Live with Gemini to brainstorm ideas, simplify complex topics and rehearse for important moments. Share your camera or screen in Gemini Live conversations to talk with Gemini about anything that you see. Just click on the Gemini Live button in your Gemini app
– Bring your ideas to life with Canvas. From prompt to prototype, create apps, games, web pages, infographics, Audio Overviews and more
– Connect with your favourite Google apps, like Search, YouTube, Google Maps, Gmail and more
– Study smarter and explore any topic with quiz and flashcard creation, interactive visuals and real-world examples
– Turn any file into a podcast that you can listen to any time, anywhere
– Create and edit stunning images from just a few words
– Plan trips better and faster
– Get summaries, deep dives and source links, all in one place
– Brainstorm new ideas or improve existing ones

Try Nano Banana: State-of-the-art image generation and editing built on Gemini 2.5 Flash


Level up your Gemini app experience by upgrading to the Plus plan – unlock new and powerful features to boost your creativity and productivity:
– Get more access to our most powerful models, like 2.5 Pro
– Generate and dive into detailed reports on any topic with Deep Research powered by 2.5 Pro
– Turn words into high-quality, eight-second video clips with video generation with Veo 3.1 Fast and more.

Google AI Plus includes additional benefits. Gemini app, as part of Google AI Plus, will be available to qualifying Google Workspace business and education plans. Learn more: https://gemini.google/subscriptions/

Get even more out of your Gemini app experience by upgrading to the Pro plan, which helps you tackle complex tasks and projects. Enjoy an industry-leading 1M token context window (enabling Gemini to process up to 1,500 pages of text or 30k lines of code), and higher access to our most capable model 2.5 Pro, Deep Research on 2.5 Pro and video generation with Veo 3.1 Fast.

Gemini in Google AI Pro includes additional benefits as part of a Google AI Pro subscription. The Gemini app, as part of Google AI Pro, will continue to be available to qualifying Google Workspace business and education plans. Learn more: https://gemini.google/subscriptions/

Get the best of Gemini app by upgrading to the Ultra plan – unlock the highest level of access to the best of Google AI and exclusive features. Get the highest access to Google's most powerful model, like 2.5 Pro, features like video generation with Veo 3.1, Deep Research on 2.5 Pro and unlock Gemini 2.5 Deep Think. You'll also get early access to try our newest AI innovations as they become available, including Agent Mode.

Gemini in Google AI Ultra includes additional benefits as part of a Google AI Ultra subscription. Google AI Ultra for Business is available as an add-on to Google Workspace customers. Learn more: https://support.google.com/a/answer/16345165

The Google Gemini mobile app is available in selected languages and countries. Learn more:
g.co/gemini/iosrequirements

Gemini Live feature availability varies based on language. Learn more:
g.co/gemini/ioslanguages

While Gemini can help you with many tasks like checking the weather, giving directions, and finding and summarising information across the web and apps, Gemini does not yet support device actions like setting an alarm, sending a text message and others on iOS.

Review the Gemini Apps Privacy Notice:
g.co/gemini/privacynotice

CNCFeedWizard is a handy calculator app made for machinists, CNC programmers, and shop owners. It helps you quickly find the right cutting speed and RPM, feed rate, and chip load per tooth for your tools. You can also work out metal removal rate (MRR) to see how fast you’re really cutting. The app includes a tool life prediction calculator using the Taylor equation, so you can plan tool changes better. It can estimate cost per part by combining tooling cost and machine time. You also get tool life per edge or per corner to track insert usage more clearly. For quality control, CNCFeedWizard offers a simple surface finish estimator for turning and milling. It even handles radial chip thinning and spindle power needs, so your feeds and speeds stay safe, efficient, and easy to set.

BoringBarCalc is a handy tool made to help machinists, programmers, and shop owners work faster and smarter. The app brings together many useful machining calculators in one easy place. You can quickly check boring bar overhang, tapping torque, thread milling speeds, and more with simple inputs. It also helps adjust feeds for helical moves, ramps, plunges, and corner cutting. Surface finish, heat input, and other cutting conditions can be understood in seconds. The app even supports planning tasks like tool consumption, reorder timing, and shift capacity. Our goal is to make machining calculations simple, accurate, and easy for everyone. With BoringBarCalc, you save time, avoid mistakes, and improve your machining results.

BoosterPumpHeat helps pump users see how elevation, weather, and water level change suction safety and NPSH margin. The app groups tools for altitude effects, daily pressure swings, tide or river level moves, and floating roof tank drawdown. Users can test strainers, fouling build-up, and suction line heat gain to balance protection, pressure loss, and temperature rise. Hot recirculation mixing, booster heater changes, and inlet velocity checks guide safer adjustments to flow and layout. Clear calculators show best and worst operating windows so cavitation risk becomes easier to spot. Simple inputs, quick graphs, and plain language make pump health checks fast for both operators and engineers. Use BoosterPumpHeat during design reviews, plant changes, or troubleshooting to keep suction conditions inside a safe zone. The app supports smarter, calmer pump decisions before problems appear in the field.

The official Gmail app brings the best of Gmail to your iPhone or iPad with robust security, real-time notifications, multiple account support and search that works across all your mail.

With the Gmail app, you can:
• Make Gmail your default email app on iOS
• Use Gemini* in Gmail to summarise emails, craft or refine responses, or search your inbox to find what you're looking for
• Automatically block more than 99.9% of spam, phishing, malware and dangerous links from ever reaching your inbox
• Undo send, to prevent embarrassing mistakes
• Turn on Google Chat to connect, create and collaborate with others
• Get more done as a group in Spaces – a dedicated place for organising people, topics and projects
• Enjoy high-quality video calling with Google Meet
• Respond to emails quickly with Smart Reply suggestions
• Switch between multiple accounts
• Get notified of new mail fast, with notification centre, badge and lock screen options
• Search your mail faster with instant results, predictions as you type and spelling suggestions
• Organise your mail by labelling, starring, deleting and reporting spam
• Swipe to archive/delete, to quickly clear out your inbox
• Read your mail with threaded conversations
• Auto-complete contact names as you type from your Google contacts or your phone
• Respond to Google Calendar invites right from the app

Gmail is part of Google Workspace, allowing you and your team to easily connect, create and collaborate. You can:
• Connect with colleagues via Google Meet or Google Chat, send an invite in Calendar, add an action to your task list and more without leaving Gmail
• Use suggested actions – like Smart Reply, Smart Compose, grammar suggestions and nudges – to help you stay on top of work and take care of simple tasks, so you can be more efficient with your time
• Stay safe. Our machine-learning models block more than 99.9% of spam, phishing and malware from reaching our users

*Google One AI Premium subscription and Internet connection required. Language and country availability may vary. Check responses for accuracy.

CutterUsageTracker is a app to keep track of every cutting tool you use on the shop floor. It lets you log tool life with fields like tool code, machine, material, cutting time, parts made, and wear condition so you can see when a cutter really needs to be changed. You can also keep a clean regrind history, noting each regrind number, date, shop, material removed, and current tool size to know how many good runs are left in a tool. Built-in converters help you switch between power, torque, and speed, and between coolant flow units like L/min and gal/min, plus bar and psi for pressure. The app also gives small calculators for engagement time per part, cycle time per part, and best step-over or step-down so you can tune your programs. With all tool and regrind data in one place, you can spot bad cutting conditions, catch root causes, and cut down on sudden tool breaks. CutterUsageTracker helps you use each cutter for the right time, lower tool costs, and keep your machines running more smoothly.

A document editor for long-form writing

Further Improve Your Writing With Grammarly Premium
Grammarly Premium makes your writing more engaging and effective with advanced suggestions for clarity, conciseness, tone, and vocabulary. Premium works across all your devices; just sign in to enjoy its benefits.

If you upgrade to a Premium subscription, payments will be charged to the account associated with your Apple ID. Your subscription will automatically renew unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. After purchase, you can manage your subscription by going to your account settings in the App Store.

Privacy Is Our Priority
Grammarly practices privacy by design. Your words are your own; we will never rent or sell your data.

Talk naturally. Flow writes perfectly. Trusted by business leaders, creatives, students, and professionals to boost productivity every day.

Wispr Flow is the AI voice keyboard and speech to text app built for speed and accuracy. It works inside any app—including Slack, Messages, Email, WhatsApp, ChatGPT, and Docs—instantly turning your spoken words into polished, formatted writing. Whether you’re taking quick notes, drafting long messages, or capturing detailed transcriptions, Flow is 4x faster than typing.

Whether you are walking, commuting, or whispering around others, Flow refines and writes what you say. No filler words, no autocorrect fumbles, no awkward phrasing. Just fast, fluent writing that sounds like you.

Why people choose Flow

 • World’s best voice‑first keyboard: Write with your voice in every application. Flow adapts tone and formatting for email, texting, and more.
 • AI‑polished output: Your voice, cleaned up and ready to send. No edits required.
 • Works in every app: From email to iMessage to Slack and Notion.
 • Natural talking only: No weird commands. Flow handles punctuation and formatting for you.
 • Learns your lingo: Add custom names, acronyms, and phrases with your personal dictionary.
 • Whisper to it: Dictate quietly without disturbing anyone nearby.
 • Quick capture notes: Use the shortcut to save ideas instantly and sync with the desktop app.
 • 100+ languages supported.

Great for

 • Replying to emails while walking the dog
 • Drafting long documents on your commute
 • Responding to your team with full context, hands‑free

Free to use with a weekly word limit. Upgrade to Pro for unlimited dictation and advanced features. Syncs with desktop apps on Mac and Windows.

Multimodal AI Core

It processes text, audio, and images simultaneously, enabling natural, seamless interactions, grasping complex questions, and maintaining context for fast, accurate, engaging chats.

Gemini – Google’s reasoning specialist

The Gemini model powered by Google adds sophisticated logical reasoning to the AI Chatbot. With Gemini, the AI Chatbot can analyze complex problems and provide well-structured, precise answers, ensuring clear, thoughtful, and accurate responses.

Grok – real-time trend and context awareness

Developed by xAI, Grok keeps the AI Chatbot current with real-time trends, cultural nuances, and evolving language, enabling timely, relevant, and socially aware replies.

Deepseek – technical and coding expertise

Deepseek enhances the AI Chatbot’s technical capabilities, specializing in programming, debugging, and algorithm explanations. Developers benefit from clear and precise assistance, making coding support efficient and reliable.

Claude – ethical and responsible AI

Anthropic’s Claude model helps maintain ethical standards and responsible AI chat. Claude moderates conversations to avoid bias, misinformation, or harmful content. This model ensures AI chat remains respectful, safe, and trustworthy, fostering a balanced experience.

Qwen – multilingual and cultural fluency

Powered by Alibaba, Qwen extends the AI Chatbot’s multilingual communication and cultural sensitivity. It comprehends language nuances, idioms, and cultural references across languages for smooth, globally aware conversations.

Flux & DALL·E – AI-powered image generation

The AI Chatbot also features AI image generation with Flux and DALL·E. DALL·E creates detailed and imaginative images from text prompts, while Flux provides enhanced artistic control and styling options.

Harnessing the combined power of Gemini, Grok, Deepseek, Claude, Qwen, Flux, and DALL·E — Built on GPT-5, Gemini, Grok, Deepseek, Qwen, Claude & AI Image Generator — Genie offers a complete AI assistant experience. Whether you are chatting, coding, analyzing, or creating images, Genie uses these models to deliver intelligent, fast, and versatile support.

Do not enter personal information. May generate offensive or dangerous content. Not liable for generated responses.

Privacy: https://appnation.co/privacy
Terms: https://appnation.co/terms

PressureLawCalc is a smart tool to help users understand pressure-related behaviour in pumps, liquids, and gases. It explains how dissolved gases turn into bubbles and how mixed vapour pressures change in real systems. The app helps you check air content, find the right place for air separators, and avoid gas pockets in suction lines. It also points out risky temperature ranges in hot-water systems and shows how tank blanketing pressure can improve safety. PressureLawCalc includes tools to see how dissolved solids affect boiling points and how start-up conditions change NPSH. It even guides you on how fast to ramp VFDs to avoid sudden pressure drops. Overall, the app gives clear, practical insights to help prevent cavitation and keep systems running smoothly.

FlowRiskPassApp is a simple and helpful app designed to check common pump and flow problems in an easy way. It helps users understand minimum flow needs, valve pressure drops, and cavitation risks without using complex formulas. The app also checks water hammer conditions, NPSH safety, and flashing risks in orifice plates. It can warn you about vortex formation, low-flow recirculation, and suction issues that may damage equipment. FlowRiskPassApp also supports surge tank and air-release sizing to keep pump suction pressure safe. It guides you in checking minimum submergence and sump approach velocity to avoid air entry and unstable flow. Overall, the app gives quick tools to make systems safer, more reliable, and easier to understand.

SumpBaffleSelector is designed to help engineers make quick and confident decisions for pump and sump setups. Our app brings together easy tools that guide you in sizing baffles, checking inlet elbow effects, and reviewing how pumps interact. It also helps you understand suction boost, seal conditions, and proper flush settings to avoid cavitation problems. You can compare inducer upgrades, explore impeller coating benefits, and estimate cavitation wear in a simple way. The app also offers a basic material selector so you can choose the right metal for tough operating conditions. We focus on clear inputs, simple steps, and results that are easy to apply in real projects. SumpBaffleSelector aims to save time, improve reliability, and support better decisions in everyday pump system work.

description:
AI QR Code Scan-QR Create primarily provides QR code and barcode scanning services, using AI to intelligently identify people, animals, scenery, and objects. For example, if you stumble upon a puppy on the street, you can point your phone at it to scan and identify it, and you'll get all its information. The recognition results will provide several suggested answers based on the photo you provide, along with probabilities, allowing you to analyze them yourself.Features:
Scanning: Supports scanning QR codes and barcodes, and can copy scanned results with one click.
AI Intelligent Recognition: Point at the object you want to identify, and a pop-up window will display the recognition results, each with a corresponding probability.
QR Code Creation: Select the desired type to create your own QR code, beautify it, and download it to your photo album.
History: Automatically record your QR code creation, scanning, and barcode history.
Privacy and Security: The QR codes you scan and the photos you identify are your personal privacy. We process them locally and never upload them to any servers. Please rest assured.

Plume AI makes speech-to-text effortless and efficient. Experience industry-leading 98.7% accuracy and instantly generate precise, editable transcripts from meetings, lectures, podcasts, or videos. Never miss a key detail again.


【 CORE FEATURES 】

   ▸ Real-Time Transcription – Convert speech to text with exceptional accuracy as it happens.
   ▸ AI Assistant – Chat with Your Audio.
          ·  Go beyond transcription. Ask questions and get instant, accurate answers about any detail from your recordings, like "What was the final decision?" or "What's the project deadline?".
   ▸ AI-Powered Cleanup – Automatically removes filler words (like "um," "uh"), corrects punctuation, and improves readability.
   ▸ AI Summaries – Instantly get summaries with key highlights to grasp core ideas in seconds.
   ▸ Import from Anywhere – Record directly or import audio/video files from any source.
   ▸ Advanced Editing – Easily edit your transcripts and export them as TXT, PDF, or cloud documents.
   ▸ Search & Tagging – Let AI help you instantly find important moments and add tags for organization.
   ▸ Multi-Language Support – Transcribe and summarize conversations in multiple languages.
   ▸ Collaborate & Share – Share transcripts and summaries with your team to boost productivity.
   ▸ Transcribe Audio & Video Files – Effortlessly import and transcribe not just recordings, but also any local audio or video files.
   ▸ Document Scanning (OCR) – Turn printed documents or images into editable text. Perfect for digitizing notes and reports.
   ▸ Live Interpretation – Speak or play audio and get instant voice translations in dozens of languages. Break down language barriers in real-time.
   ▸ Text-to-Speech – Convert any text into natural-sounding audio. Listen to articles, notes, or scripts on the go.
   ▸ Audio Toolkit – Trim, merge, split, and adjust the speed of your audio files with our easy-to-use editing suite.


【 DESIGNED FOR YOU 】

Whether you're a professional capturing meeting notes, a student reviewing lecture highlights, a journalist on a deadline, or a creator repurposing content, Plume AI is the ultimate tool to enhance your workflow.
